<!-- Auto-generated by zod-args-parser -->

# listy

**Listy** is a simple CLI to showcase arguments **parsing** and **validation**.

**Example:**

```bash
listy --help
listy help add-items
listy add-items --list groceries --items egg,milk,bread --tags food
listy remove-items --list todos clean cook
listy create-list groceries "List of groceries"
listy delete-list groceries
```

## Options:

### `--help, -h` _optional_

Show help message.

### `--version, -v` _optional_

Show listy version.

### `--db` _optional_

**default:** `{"host":"localhost","port":5432,"https":false,"credentials":{"user":"postgres","pass":"postgres"}}`

## Subcommands:

### add-items, ai

Add new items to the list.

**Example:**

```bash
listy add-items --list groceries --items egg,milk,bread --tags food
listy add-items --list todos --items clean,cook --tags chores,work
```

#### Options:

#### `--list, -l <list-name>`

The name of the list to add items to.

#### `--items, -i <item, ...items>`

The items to add to the list. separated by a comma `,`.

#### `--tags, -t <tag, ...tags>` _optional_

The tags to add to the list. separated by a comma `,`.

#### `--verbose` _optional_

Enable verbose mode.

---

### remove-items, ri [options] &lt;...items&gt;

Remove items from the list.

**Example:**

```bash
listy remove-items --list groceries egg milk bread
listy remove-items --list todos clean cook
```

#### Options:

#### `--list, -l <list-name>`

The name of the list to remove items from.

#### `--verbose` _optional_

Enable verbose mode.

---

### create-list, cl

Create a new list.

**Example:**

```bash
listy create-list groceries "List of groceries"
```

#### Options:

#### `--overwrite, -o` _optional_

Overwrite the list if it already exists.

**default:** `false`

#### `--verbose` _optional_

Enable verbose mode.

#### Arguments:

#### `listName`

The name of the list to create.

#### `listDescription` _optional_

The description of the list to create.

---

### delete-list, dl

Delete a specific list.

**Example:**

```bash
listy delete-list groceries
```

#### Options:

#### `--verbose` _optional_

Enable verbose mode.

#### Arguments:

#### `listName`

The name of the list to delete.

---

### view-list, vl

View a specific list or all lists.

**Example:**

```bash
listy view-list groceries
```

#### Options:

#### `--verbose` _optional_

Enable verbose mode.

#### Arguments:

#### `listName` _optional_

The name of the list to view. Leave blank to view all lists.

---

### help, h &lt;command-name&gt;

Show help message for a specific command.

#### Options:

#### `--verbose` _optional_

Enable verbose mode.

#### Arguments:

#### `commandName` _optional_

Command to print help for.  
**Available commands:** `add-items`, `create-list`, `delete-list`, `remove-items`, `help`
